map.name: Vegas
map.objective: Capture both of the enemy's wools, and upgrade your team at the Cocktail Club!

broadcasts.alert: Earn chips from kills, mining, spawners, or testing your luck at the Roulette tables. Use these chips to upgrade your gear!
broadcasts.tip: Earn chips from kills, mining, spawners, or testing your luck at the Roulette tables. Use these chips to upgrade your gear!

message.text: `bYour sword has been upgraded to `4`lSharpness I`r`b!
`bYour sword has been upgraded to `4`lSharpness II`r`b!
`bYour armor has been upgraded to `9`lProtection I`r`b!
`bYour team's base now has a `7`lMining Fatigue Trap`r`b!
`bYour team now has `7`lHealth Boost I`r`b when in the enemy's base!
`bYour team now has `7`lHealth Boost II`r`b when in the enemy's base!
`bYour team's kit has been upgraded to `b`lChainmail`r`b!
`bYour team's kit has been upgraded to `f`lIron`r`b!
`bYour team's kit has been upgraded to `b`lDiamond`r`b!

apply.message: You may not break or place around the spawner!
You may not break the ender chest!
You may not enter the opponent's spawn!
You may not enter the opponent's spawn!
You may not enter the opponent's spawn!
You may not enter the opponent's spawn!
You may not enter your own wool room!
You may not enter your own wool room!
You may not interact with this block!
You may not interact with this block!
You may not build in the void area!
You may not modify the spawns!

item.name: Knockback Stick
item.lore: Don't die or you'll lose me!
`7Instantly ignites once placed.

item.name: `7`lChainmail Kit
item.lore: `7Your team's spawn kit now|`7has chainmail leggings and boots

item.name: `f`lIron Kit
item.lore: `7Your team's spawn kit now|`7has iron leggings, boots, and sword

item.name: `b`lDiamond Kit
item.lore: `7Your team's spawn kit now|`7has diamond leggings and boots

item.name: `4`lSharpness I
item.lore: `7Your team permanently gains|`7Sharpness I on all swords

item.name: `4`lSharpness II
item.lore: `7Your team permanently gains|`7Sharpness II on all swords

item.name: `e`lProtection I
item.lore: `7Your team permanently gains|`7Protection I on all pieces.

item.name: `6`lHaste I
item.lore: `7All players on your team|`7permanently gain Haste I!.

item.name: `6`lHaste II
item.lore: `7All players on your team|`7permanently gain Haste II!.

item.name: `c`lSpeed I
item.lore: `7All players on your team|`7permanently gain Speed I!.

item.name: `c`lForward Spawn
item.lore: `7All players on your team will|`7spawn closer to the frontlines.

item.name: `7`lMining Fatigue Trap
item.lore: `7Enemies who enter your side will|`7receive Mining Fatigue I.

item.name: `4`lOffensive Health boost I
item.lore: `7Entering enemy territory will|`7grant Health Boost I.

item.name: `4`lOffensive Health boost II
item.lore: `7Entering enemy territory will|`7grant Health Boost II.

item.name: `7`lWager 4
item.lore: `7|Just for Fun

item.lore: `7|Lets push it a little

item.name: `7`lWager 16
item.lore: `7|I'm feeling lucky

item.name: `7`lWager 32
item.lore: `7|Now I just feel confident

item.name: `7`lWager 64
item.lore: `7|This is not a good idea...

item.name: `7`lWager 128
item.lore: `7|I hope your teammates know your doing this!
